name: Shifter
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Shifting (Recharges after a Short or Lon: As a bonus action, the shifter takes on a more bestial form for 1 minute or until it dies. The shifter gains 5 temporary hit points. It can make a bite attack when it activates this trait and also as a bonus action on each of its turns while in its bestial form.
